name: Four Exam Fiends
description:
Made for the RPGM Back to School Jam

Gather a party of 4 students and defeat the 4 teachers to pass the exam, or fail and repeat the year!

Made entirely with RPGMMZ's RTP.

NOTICE: NOT EVEN HALFWAY FINISHED YET
